segments.text: I notice the water pouring from the sink like a waterfall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a big puddle on the kitchen floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is so absorbed in drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She hasn't turned around to see the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress might get soaked if she steps back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is wobbling as he reaches high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate while fishing for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks eager, palm up for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a sweet moment of sibling teamwork.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the whole scene makes me uneasy with all the hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden bushes are trimmed nicely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This contrast with the indoor slipperiness is stark.
segments.speaker: PAR
